Shapoor to Bailey, no run pitched up outside off, that's driven straight to extra cover
Shapoor to Bailey, OUT gets the yorker right but after being hit around, in the blockhole on middle, Bailey fails to dig it out and the stumps take a beating
Sadiq to Hussey, SIX runs full toss on the off and Hussey deals with it, thrashes it over long-on for another six, cleanly struck
Sadiq to Hussey, OUT bowled'im, misses his half-century, shortish on the off, moves away to chop that through point, gets an inside edge onto the stumps
Sadiq to Pattinson, 1 run shortish and it kept low, was lucky to get some bat on that as he tried to pull, just the single
Sadiq to Johnson, 1 run flighted outside off, cracked straight to extra cover for a single
Sadiq to Pattinson, OUT Another wicket for Sadiq, slogs at that one, it's a straight ball from round the wicket, misses it completely and is bowled
Sadiq to Starc, 1 run fullish outside off, dug out past cover, collects a single

Afghanistan seem fairly satisfied with that effort. A good performance from Sadiq, who was economical. But Australia have a very good score on a slow pitch. Afghanistan fought back to pick up those three wickets in the batting Powerplay, but that stand between Michael Hussey and George Bailey boosted them to a
We are ready for the Afghanistan chase. Welcome back. Ahmadi and Sadiq to open for Afghanistan. Pattinson runs in
Pattinson to Sadiq, FOUR runs excellent start, a full delivery on the pads and that's been driven hard through midwicket for a boundary, firmly hit
Pattinson to Sadiq, no run shaping away there, in the channel outside off and he leaves that one alone to the keeper
Pattinson to Sadiq, no run short of a good length, gets on the back foot and drops it into the leg side in front of the bowler
Pattinson to Sadiq, 1 run drops that short on the leg stump, turns that away towards fine leg for a single
Pattinson to Javed, no run pitched on a length on the off, that's been pushed straight to mid-off
Pattinson to Javed, no run short of a length outside off, tries to cut that past point, doesn't make contact
Starc to Sadiq, no run the ball curves in there, swung in to land on a good length outside off, mistimes an attempted drive to mid-off
Starc to Sadiq, no run pitched up on middle, bowled quick and got it to swing in, just managed to get some bat on it, an inside edge onto the pads
Starc to Sadiq, no run short of a good length on the off, rocks back and pushes it to extra cover
Starc to Sadiq, 1 bye goodish length outside off, tries to crash it through extra cover, misses and so does Wade, who concedes a bye, good carry there
Starc to Asghar, no run in the channel outside off stump and he lets that one go through
Pattinson to Sadiq, 1 run short of a good length, punched wide of mid-off for a single
Pattinson to Asghar, no run this one came back in, got forward and got a thick inside edge towards square leg
Pattinson to Asghar, no run they like playing their shots, dropped it short on the off, pulled but straight to midwicket, kept it down
Pattinson to Asghar, no run bowled that one in the channel outside off, moving away and it's left alone
Pattinson to Asghar, 1 wide a touch too wide there and it's called by the umpire, he leaves that one alone
Pattinson to Asghar, 1 run edged and goes down towards third man, didn't go hard at that one, all along the ground for a single
Pattinson to Sadiq, no run Sadiq drives that one sweetly, pitched on a length outside off, straight to mid-off
Starc to Asghar, no run short of a good length outside off and it's been left alone to the keeper
Starc to Asghar, 1 run shortish on the off, played it towards square leg for a single
Starc to Sadiq, no run shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and crunches it to point
Starc to Sadiq, FOUR runs slashed hard, short of a good length, tried to smack it over point, got a thick outside edge well past second slip for a boundary
Starc to Sadiq, no run dropped it short on middle, ducks under that one and lets it be
Starc to Sadiq, FOUR runs goes over point, on a good length and he slices that over the in-field, got a good amount of bat on it, earns a boundary
Pattinson to Asghar, FOUR runs boundaries flowing for Afghanistan, short and wide and he gets into position early to smack it through point
Pattinson to Asghar, no run beaten, bowled from slightly wide of the crease, short of a good length and moved away, pushed at it and missed
Pattinson to Asghar, no run in the channel outside off stump, a bit of away movement there, left alone to the keeper
Pattinson to Asghar, no run shortish on the off, pushed from the crease towards cover
Pattinson to Asghar, no run fires it full on middle, plays it out towards mid-on from the crease, attempted yorker
Pattinson to Asghar, no run short of a good length on the off, rocked back to defend, got an inside edge and dropped into the leg side

Starc to Sadiq, no run struck on the helmet, dropped it short and it nipped back in, was too late to react there, tried to duck but in vain, got him hard on the helmet, Starc immediately asks him if he's doing fine and he is
Starc to Sadiq, 2 runs he's lost his bat, heaved that one, didn't connect as well as he would have liked though, past square leg for a couple of runs
Starc to Sadiq, 1 run fierce bowling from Starc, tries to fend that one away, short ball, sharp and it nips back in, comes off the glove and then the helmet, goes towards fine leg
Starc to Asghar, 1 run ooh, lovely delivery, curving in again and he just managed to get his bat down in time, almost yorker length, gets an inside edge for a single
Starc to Shahzad, no run short of a good length on the off, rocks back and taps it towards point
Johnson to Asghar, no run starts off with a widish delivery, slightly short and it keeps low, left alone to the keeper
Johnson to Asghar, no run well fielded at cover point, short of a good length and it's crunched hard into the ground, Maxwell throws himself to his left
Johnson to Asghar, 1 run short of a good length, runs that towards third man for a single
Johnson to Shahzad, 1 wide wide, too wide, full and Shehzad doesn't need to play at that one
Johnson to Shahzad, 1 run pulled hard, took his eyes off the ball for a moment there, dropped that short did Johnson and it was played to fine leg
Johnson to Asghar, 1 run shortish on middle, turned towards fine leg for a single
Johnson to Shahzad, no run goodish length on the off, rocks on the back foot and defends it towards cover
Starc to Asghar, 1 wide down the leg side, some swing there but misdirected, a single to the score courtesy a wide
Starc to Asghar, 2 runs swinging in, on middle, flicked away through square leg into the deep for a couple of runs
Starc to Asghar, no run shortish outside off, chopped into the ground towards point
Starc to Asghar, no run low full toss outside off, he didn't see that coming did Stanikzai, defended awkwardly towards point
Starc to Asghar, no run in the channel outside off, leaves that one alone to the keeper
Starc to Asghar, no run short and he sensed a chance, shaped up for a pull but it came on to him a little quickly, got an inside edge onto the ribs

Starc to Asghar, 4 leg byes slides down the leg side, full and down the leg side, clipped past short fine to the boundary, did it come off the pads? Starc appealed for lbw but that was missing leg anyway
Johnson to Shahzad, no run a full toss well outside off, tries to flay that through the covers, gets an inside edge towards the keeper
Johnson to Shahzad, 1 run short of a good length, punched wide of extra cover for a single
Johnson to Asghar, no run beaten, on a length outside off, gets forward to defend but is late on the shot, goes past the outside edge
Johnson to Asghar, no run shortish on the off, rocks back and taps that towards point from the crease
Johnson to Asghar, no run pitched up and he drives that well but straight to cover point, hit hard into the ground
Johnson to Asghar, no run beaten, this one moved away just a hint and Stanikzai got forward to that good length ball, just went past the outside edge
Pattinson to Shahzad, 2 runs angling in towards middle, forces that through midwicket for a couple of runs, was slightly uppish but safe in the end
Pattinson to Shahzad, FOUR runs lovely shot from Shehzad, pitched up from Pattinson and he rocked forward to cream that elegantly through the covers
Pattinson to Shahzad, no run short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and defends
Pattinson to Shahzad, 1 run fires it quick on middle, gets across and clips it through square leg for a single
Pattinson to Asghar, no run pitched up outside off, drives it straight to mid-off from the crease
Pattinson to Asghar, no run short of a good length, rocks back and defends him in front of the bowler
Johnson to Shahzad, 1 run uppish, pitched on a length and he chips that between mid-on and midwicket, didn't time it but it landed safe
Johnson to Asghar, no run short of a good length, gets on the back foot and punches that towards extra cover
Johnson to Asghar, no run shapes up to play an attacking shot through cover but mistimes it, straight to extra cover
Johnson to Asghar, 1 run slower one this time, steered that one wide of third man behind point for a single
Johnson to Shahzad, 1 run edged, shortish on the off, played it down did Shehzad, Clarke's there at first slip but he fumbled
Johnson to Asghar, 1 wide drops that short, too high and it's called a wide, Stanikzai hooks and misses
Johnson to Asghar, no run slightly short on the off, defends that towards cover from the crease
Pattinson to Mangal, no run shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and defends it towards square leg

Pattinson to Mangal, OUT trapped in front, Pattinson pushes that full, on middle and leg, Mangal gets a little across, is on the crease when he misses and it strikes him on the pads, the only question was whether it missed leg. Unlikely, and that's what the umpire thinks as well, one more goes
Pattinson to M Nabi, no run short of a good length, rocks forward and presents the straight bat to the bowler
Pattinson to M Nabi, no run angling in towards middle, gets across and defends it towards midwicket
Pattinson to M Nabi, no run short of a good length, pushed firmly but straight to cover point
Doherty to Asghar, 1 run flighted on the off, gets forward and gets an inside edge wide of square leg for a single
Doherty to M Nabi, no run flighted on the off, gets forward and he pushes it back to the bowler
Doherty to M Nabi, 1 run shortish outside off, gets on the back foot and slaps it to deep cover for a single
Doherty to Asghar, 1 run tossed up on the off, gets forward to defend, gets an inside edge
Doherty to M Nabi, 1 run short and it's crashed towards deep cover for a single
Doherty to Asghar, 1 run shortish outside off, cut down to deep point for a single
Johnson to Asghar, no run full outside off, sliced on the bounce towards Warner who dives to his left and saves the single, also throws at the non-striker's end
Johnson to Asghar, no run goodish length, tries to drive that on the up through extra cover, got an inside edge towards the keeper
Johnson to Asghar, no run full but a touch too wide, tries to reach for it and he misses

Johnson to Asghar, 1 leg bye angling in towards middle, clipped that behind square leg for a single into the deep

Doherty to Asghar, 1 run a bit of an outside edge there, tossed up again, turns away, played behind point for a single

Johnson to M Nabi, no run goodish length on the off, gets forward and plays it back to the bowler

Doherty to M Nabi, no run floating it on middle, gets forward and taps it in front of cover

Doherty to Asghar, no run fired it quick on middle, gets on the back foot and plays it to midwicket
Doherty to Asghar, 1 run goes for another big one, gets a leading edge as he tries to go over midwicket again, was the flighted ball, it turned away and he was lucky it landed safe behind point

Doherty to M Nabi, SIX runs that's a massive six, didn't get to the pitch, was bowled flat but he had made up his mind, charged down the track and sent it miles over the long-on boundary, over the roof
Doherty to M Nabi, no run flighted on middle and it's defended soundly into the leg side
Doherty to M Nabi, no run flat this time, pushes it back towards the bowler
Maxwell to Asghar, 1 run worked away through square leg for a single, Maxwell's bowling round the wicket
Maxwell to M Nabi, SIX runs Nabi had again made up his mind, played it with the turn, that was the key, charged down and heaved it high behind the deep square leg fielder, connected very well indeed
Maxwell to M Nabi, no run slightly short outside off, pushes it to point
Maxwell to M Nabi, 2 leg byes nicely played, that's turning down and he paddles it smartly wide of fine leg for a couple of runs
Maxwell to M Nabi, no run shortish on the off, crunched it straight towards cover
Maxwell to M Nabi, no run flattish on the off and it's been pushed towards cover

Maxwell to Asghar, no run waits for that one to turn in and nudges it towards point
Maxwell to Asghar, 1 run gets front and across and drives it through square leg for a single

Starc to Asghar, 1 run dropped, took the fielder by surprise at midwicket, Stanikzai struck it well, landed on a good length and he struck across the line, George Bailey didn't react in time, tried to take it in front of his chest but failed to hold on
Starc to M Nabi, no run dropped that one short and he is struck on the shoulder as he takes his eyes off it

Maxwell to M Nabi, SIX runs superbly struck, the ball actually curved in the air after impact, dead straight, came down and hammered it over the bowler's head
Starc to Asghar, 1 run turned off the back foot into the leg side

Starc to M Nabi, 1 wide an attempted slower bouncer gone bad, dropped it short, way too short and the umpire had no hesitation calling it a wide, two batsmen on top of one another would not have covered it

Pattinson to Asghar, FOUR runs nicely hit, short and he's pulled that one away, pulled it hard over square leg and found the boundary

Pattinson to Asghar, no run lands on a good length, defends that back towards the bowler

Johnson to Asghar, no run Johnson goes round the wicket, bowled it on a good length, defended towards extra cover
Johnson to Asghar, 2 runs angling in, whipped through square leg for a couple of runs, a good throw from the deep from Maxwell but Stanikzai was in and the keeper took off the bails with his gloves

Johnson to Asghar, 2 runs gets a bit of a leading edge wide of point, they run a couple

Starc to Asghar, FOUR runs three boundaries in the over, Starc has bowled badly this over, full toss and it's another four over mid-off, Afghanistan are fighting, Stanikzai's in pain again

Starc to Asghar, OUT taken! Stanikzai has to go and his arms are over his head in disbelief, short and wide and he drags it hard towards midwicket, Clarke reacts sharply and takes a good catch moving to his left, relief for Australia, the end of another fighting knock

Pattinson to Gulbadin, 1 wide slower one bowled outside off, a marginal call there, Bowden thinks it's a wide, a little harsh there
Pattinson to Gulbadin, no run dropped that short on middle and he let that one go, not a wide, was the right height thinks Bowden
Doherty to Zadran, no run tossed up on leg stump, doesn't get bat to it, clips the pads and goes behind point, no single there
Doherty to Zadran, no run gets forward and defends that towards midwicket
Doherty to Zadran, no run shortish on the off, chopped that towards extra cover
Doherty to Zadran, no run defends it a little uppishly towards extra cover
Doherty to Zadran, no run shortish on the off, taps it in front of extra cover
Doherty to Zadran, no run gets forward and plays out a maiden, defending it towards midwicket
Pattinson to Gulbadin, no run in the channel outside off stump and he lets that one go through
Pattinson to Gulbadin, no run swings hard, was the slower one, it cut away and he missed
Pattinson to Gulbadin, 1 wide too wide this time and it's called by the umpire

Pattinson to Gulbadin, OUT short and Naib shapes up for a cut, there was an edge, a clear sound as he went for it, Wade dived low and to his left to catch that, the umpires are trying to verify if it carried, they've gone to the third umpire. Replays show it was a clean catch, he's got to go
Pattinson to Shapoor, no run short of a good length, pushes at that one and misses
Pattinson to Shapoor, 1 wide Pattinson goes round the wicket and bowls a wide down the leg side, raises the Afghan 200
Pattinson to Shapoor, no run tries to fend it, strikes him on the pads, they decide not to run a leg-bye
Pattinson to Shapoor, 1 leg bye full outside leg stump, clips the pads and they take a leg-bye this time
Doherty to Shapoor, 1 run slog-sweep, drags it towards deep midwicket for a single
Doherty to Zadran, no run comes down the track and tries to swing it into the stands, gets a thick inside edge
Doherty to Zadran, no run goodish length on the off, pushes that back down the pitch
Doherty to Zadran, FOUR runs that's been swept powerfully, tossed up and he smacks that through deep square leg

There's a trophy for this one-off game and it's been handed to Michael Clarke. That's all from us here. Thanks for tuning in and we'll see you when the Pakistan-Australia series begins. See ya. You can read the report for this match here.

The four early wickets pegged Afghanistan back early but from there on we saw some fight from them. Nabi and Stanikzai were slow to start off but gradually opened up and would have had Australia a bit concerned at one point. But Nabi gave his wicket away and Australia tightened their grip during the batting Po
Australia won by 66 runs
Player of the match is Mitchell Starc, AUS
